title: Updated Morgana and Kayle skins are a bit disappointing
body: Was super excited by the announcements of the kayle and morgana visual and game play updates but that quickly turned to disappointment when i saw how similar all the skins look to the classic skins apart from colour changes and texture... THEY . JUST . LOOK . LIKE . CHROMAS. I'm honestly disappointed they hardly changed the character models for the skins at all on morgana.
